import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProServices from '../../../services/pro.services' import './pro-details.css' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class ProDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { pro: {} } this.services = new ProServices() } componentDidMount = () => this.getProDetails() getProDetails = () => { this.services.getProDetails(this.props.match.params.id) .then(thePro => this.setState({ pro: thePro })) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { return (

{this.state.pro.name}

Stats

Descripci√≥n: {this.state.pro.description}

kda: {this.state.pro.kda}

posicion: {this.state.pro.position}

 ) } } export default ProDetails
